title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; promises & streams for chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer; use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI); chat history, RAG, user auth, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation memory, prompt templates, and markdown output.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG prototype: ingest PDFs → Chroma → Ollama for local question answering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models inline for code completion and explanation.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, maven-central.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF-QA, voice chat, function-calling, Next.js chat, GPU metrics, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-npm (unofficial wrapper)
summary: Thin npm wrapper that downloads and manages the ollama binary for CI/CD pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within your vault for summarization or brainstorming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into any channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-sd-webui
summary: Extension for AUTOMATIC1111 Stable-Diffusion-WebUI that uses Ollama for prompt generation and interrogation.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that forwards channel mentions to Ollama and streams answers back.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot with group & private chat support, session memory, and per-user model selection.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama-backed chat and embedding widgets with admin integration.
